answers.answer: I would go into the ER that sounds like preeclampsia you shouldn't wait on something like that even though you have an appointment
I would call first thing just to see what they would like you to do just to be on the safe side.
And after you've called drink lots of water! Hope all is well and glad you're going to be seen today
Yes I've been downing water. My hand is a little better, but I'm still waiting on a response from her. :/

question: hey ladies. So my legs and hands have been puffy for awhile now. But I woke up this morning and suddenly my right hand is much larger and actually hurts. It's so big it's hard to text & hold my iPhone. And my arm is a little sore.  I have an appointment late today. But should I call first thing in the am? I'm actually alittle worried...I'm 36 3days.
title: Help!!! Swollen!
